name: Cleaner Bonnaroo Lineup
description:
I organized the line-up list into three columns. I also alternated the colors between bands.

-Edit February 27, 2013-

The code now works for the alphabetical list too (somewhat)

-Edit March 3, 2013-

Added Screenshots - that is all.

-Edit April 11, 2014-

re-worked the old css to work with the new Lineup's code/color scheme.
alternating colors are now white and light grey.
Changed the font size for the bands to 20px.
Updated the screenshot.
